org.jamwiki.parser

Class WikiLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.parser.WikiLink

  • public class WikiLink
extends Object
    Utility method used in processing Wiki links.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WikiLink

        public WikiLink(String contextPath,
                String virtualWiki,
                String destination)
        Standard constructor which initializes the destination field of the wiki link.
        Parameters:
        contextPath - The servlet context path. If this value is null then calling toRelativeUrl() will generate a a URL without a context path, which breaks HTML links but is useful for servlet redirection URLs.
        virtualWiki - The current link virtual wiki. This is the virtual wiki that will be used when converting this WikiLink object to a relative URL UNLESS there is an altVirtualWiki specified.
        destination - The topic that this link points to, including the namespace. May be null if (for example) this link is to a section within the current article of the form "#Section". If this value is not null then it must be clean - if it is prefixed with a virtual wiki, has a query string, is encoded, or otherwise requires additional processing then this method will not perform as expected.

      • WikiLink

        protected WikiLink(String contextPath,
                   String virtualWiki)
        Constructor used by LinkUtil.parseWikiLink that allows that method to manually initialize most fields.

      • WikiLink

        protected WikiLink(WikiLink wikiLink)
        Copy constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        protected void initialize(String destination)
                   throws IllegalStateException,
                          IllegalArgumentException
        Set the namespace and article fields for this wiki link based on the destination value. Note that the destination must be clean - if it is prefixed with a virtual wiki, has a query string, is encoded, or otherwise requires additional processing then this method will not perform as expected.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if a data access error occurs, which could indicate a database failure or other system problem.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if this method is called with a null destination or virtual wiki.

      • getAltVirtualWiki

        public VirtualWiki getAltVirtualWiki()
        Return the internal virtual wiki that this wiki link is linking to. Note that this parameter is used when linking to a different virtual wiki and thus may be null when the link is to a topic in the same virtual wiki.

      • setAltVirtualWiki

        public void setAltVirtualWiki(VirtualWiki altVirtualWiki)
        Set the internal virtual wiki that this wiki link is linking to. Note that this parameter is used when linking to a different virtual wiki and thus may be null when the link is to a topic in the same virtual wiki.

      • getArticle

        public String getArticle()
        Return the topic that this link points to, not including the namespace. May be null if (for example) this link is to a section within the current article of the form "#Section".

      • setArticle

        public void setArticle(String article)
        Set the topic that this link points to, not including the namespace. May be null if (for example) this link is to a section within the current article of the form "#Section".

      • getColon

        public boolean getColon()

      • setColon

        public void setColon(boolean colon)

      • getContextPath

        public String getContextPath()
        Return the servlet context path for this wiki link. In some cases this value may be initialized to null, if for example a redirection URL is being generated relative to the context root.

      • getDestination

        public String getDestination()
        Return the topic that this link points to, including the namespace. May be null if (for example) this link is to a section within the current article of the form "#Section".

      • setDestination

        public void setDestination(String destination)
        Set the topic that this link points to, including the namespace. May be null if (for example) this link is to a section within the current article of the form "#Section".

      • getInterwiki

        public Interwiki getInterwiki()
        Return the interwiki link object if this wiki link references is to a configured interwiki.

      • setInterwiki

        public void setInterwiki(Interwiki interwiki)
        Set the interwiki link object if this wiki link references is to a configured interwiki.

      • getNamespace

        public Namespace getNamespace()
        Return the namespace object for this wiki link's target topic, or null if there is no target topic.

      • setNamespace

        public void setNamespace(Namespace namespace)
        Set the namespace object for this wiki link's target topic.

      • getQuery

        public String getQuery()
        Return the query string that this link refers to ("?param=value"). This method returns the query string without the opening "?", or null if there is no query string for this link.

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery(String query)
        Set the query string that this link refers to ("?param=value"). Minimal processing is done by this method to strip any opening "?" and to ensure that the supplied value has non-whitespace content.

      • getSection

        public String getSection()
        Return the section within a page that this link refers to ("#Section"). This method returns the section name without the opening "#", or null if there is no section for this link.

      • setSection

        public void setSection(String section)
        Set the section within a page that this link refers to ("#Section"). Minimal processing is done by this method to strip any opening "#" and to ensure that the supplied value has non-whitespace content.

      • isSpecial

        public boolean isSpecial()
        Utility method for determining if this wiki link is in the Special: namespace.

      • getText

        public String getText()

      • setText

        public void setText(String text)

      • getVirtualWiki

        public String getVirtualWiki()
        The current link virtual wiki. This is the virtual wiki that will be used when converting this WikiLink object to a relative URL UNLESS there is an altVirtualWiki specified.

      • toRelativeUrl

        public String toRelativeUrl()
        Utility method for converting a WikiLink to a relative URL. This method does NOT verify if the topic exists or if it is a "Special:" page, but simply returns a relative URL for the topic and virtual wiki.
        Returns:
        A relative URL for the wiki link. Sample return values might be of the form "/context/virtualwiki/Topic?param=value#Section", "#Section", "/context/virtualwiki/Namespace:Topic", etc.
